data.actual_result: Discord crashes after a few seconds
data.expected_result: The failure alert shows and nothing else
data.short_description: Discord crashes when sending an invalid message though the inline reply while Discord is open
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord - Go to a channel with no particular activity - Quit Discord - Have someone mention you in a channel different that the one you picked at step 2. You should have received a push notification with ability to reply -  Now re-open Discord via multi-tasking or via the homescreen icon, ensure that you don't dismiss the push notification - Pull down your notification drawer and hit Reply - In the textfield, enter an invalid message. For example, input a Space character and send the message - You will see a "Failed to send mesage" alert. Just ignore it, collapse your notification drawer and get back at chatting on Discord - After a few seconds, Discord crashes
